name: Slimage (SlimImage)
body:
### Overview

slimage (Slim Image) is focused on full-stack responsive imaging. It requires an [RIAPI-compliant](http://riapi.org) backend to perform on-demand resizing.

It is *CSS-friendly** - your sizing logic stays in your CSS files, and you can use media queries.

It is **context-aware** - if you're images have 'max-width:100%' but are inside a column, they will be sized to the column width, not the screen width.

It is **CDN-smart** - images are sized in intervals of 160px to minimize the number of variants (this comes out to roughly 13 versions, and is configurable).
